name: Farih Akmal Haqiqi
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Today is your special birthday, i have three big wishes for you, I wish you peace, joy and love, All day and all year through..
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Semoga kebahagiaan yang kamu berikan kepada orang lain kembali kepadamu di hari istimewa ini. Hope your birthday is as special as you are.
replayText: Sending you big hugs for your birthday!❤️
